comments: Same as A257163 without its first term. - _Jonathan Sondow_, Oct 24 2015The domain of n is not explicit. If the domain is all integers then the sequence A257163 is produced. In this sequence domain is all nonnegative integers. - _Michael Somos_, Oct 24 2015
prog: (PARI) select(isprime, vector(100,n,3*n^2+2)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 17 2015
author: _Patrick De Geest_
